attributes.action: Ask the Queen to disolve parliment and appoint Merlin (our cat) as PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Merlin (our cat) promises to:

Never lie. FOREVER
Never claim any expenses - EVER

Re focus on good food, warm houses (no VAT on heating bills) etc.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
